title.native: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード外伝 イフ-if-

description:
The history of -IF- world has been distorted and cardfights do not exist. Ibuki and Suiko get involved with Emi and Shuka.

A journey to regain the true history by four people begins—!

(Source: Cardfight!! Vanguard Wiki)

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

title.native: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード 続・高校生編

node.description:
An all-male band in the ARGONAVIS project of the BanG Dream! franchise. It is composed of 5 members: [Masahiro Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/150456/Masahiro-Itou) as Ren Nanahoshi on vocals, [Daisuke Hyuga](https://anilist.co/staff/150444/Daisuke-Hyuga) as Yuuto Goryou on guitar, [Seiji Maeda](https://anilist.co/staff/128082/Seiji-Maeda) as Wataru Matoba on bass, [Shouhei Hashimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/134241/Shouhei-Hashimoto) as Banri Shiroishi on drums, and [Shuuta Morishima](https://anilist.co/staff/106743/Shuuta-Morishima) Rio Kikyou on keyboard.

The band was announced shortly before the start of the BanG Dream! 5th☆LIVE. Due to an uproar of worried fans that the characters from Girls Band Party! will have to interact with male characters, Takaaki Kidani, Bushiroad's President, clarified that the male project will not mix and interact with the existing project.

On May 11, 2018, Daisuke, Shuuta, and Seiji  were the first three voice actors to be revealed as part of the project. They announced the joining of Masahiro during their Argonavis 0-2nd LIVE -The Beginning- which they held on September 15, 2018. The last member to join was Shouhei, announced during their Argonavis 0-BEYOND LIVE -The Beginning-.

The name Argonavis is a reference from a large ship named Argo Navis in old Greek mythology, which was a large constellation that no longer exists, as it has been divided into four seperate ones: Vela, Puppis, Carina, and Pyxis, which gathered together and become the ship's head, the Argo. According to Morishima, "Argonavis" is the keyword of the combination of all stars.

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia, edited)

RONDO is an all-girl DJ group in the Dig Delight Direct Drive DJ franchise. Their genre is an eclectic mix of heavy alternative metal music and electronic elements.

The group consists of four members:

- [Rihona Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/204571/Rihona-Katou) as [Tsubaki Aoyagi](https://anilist.co/character/204570/Tsubaki-Aoyagi)
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/Sae-Otsuka) as [Nagisa Tsukimiyama](https://anilist.co/character/206279/Nagisa-Tsukimiyama)
- [Haruna Momono](https://anilist.co/staff/139262/Haruna-Momono) as [Hiiro Yano](https://anilist.co/character/206282/Hiiro-Yano)
- [Tsunko](https://anilist.co/staff/206301/Tsunko) as [Aoi Miyake](https://anilist.co/character/206288/Aoi-Miyake)

Peaky P-key is an all-girl DJ group in the Dig Delight Direct Drive DJ franchise. They are a popular unit by Yoba Academy's finest students. Their music genre consists of Techno, Rap, Eurobeat and Electro Pop. 

The group is comprised of 4 members:

- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi) as [Kyouko Yamate](https://anilist.co/character/182718/Kyouko-Yamate)
- [Reo Kurachi](https://anilist.co/staff/137053/Reo-Kurachi) as [Esora Shimizu](https://anilist.co/character/189833/Esora-Shimizu)
- [Miyu Takagi](https://anilist.co/staff/118476/Miyu-Takagi) as [Shinobu Inuyose](https://anilist.co/character/189830/Shinobu-Inuyose)
- [Moeka Koizumi](https://anilist.co/staff/126657/Moeka-Koizumi) as [Yuka Jennifer Sasago](https://anilist.co/character/189828/Yuka-Jennifer-Sasago)
